```js
    $ ember g controller application

    ```

```js
    $ ember g controller application
    $ ember g route application

    ```

```js // app/templates/application.hbs

Welcome to Ember

```

```js
    $ ember g route foo1
    $ ember g route foo2
    $ ember g controller foo1
    $ ember g controller foo2
    $ ember g template index

    ```

```js // app/templates/foo1.hbs This is Foo1
```

```js // app/templates/foo2.hbs This is Foo2
```

```js // app/templates/index.hbs {{link-to 'Foo1 Route' 'foo1'}}
{{link-to 'Foo2 Route' 'foo2'}}
```

```js
    $ ember g route foo1
    $ ember g route foo1/foo2
    $ ember g controller foo1
    $ ember g controller foo1/foo2
    $ ember g template index

    ```
